fullText: Angela Lansbury and Marian Seldes bring their formidable combined stage experience to bear on Terrence McNally's slight but affecting two-hander about longtime tennis partners facing the twilight of their careers.
dtliExcerpt: Angela Lansbury and Marian Seldes bring their formidable combined stage experience to bear on Terrence McNally's slight but affecting two-hander about longtime tennis partners facing the twilight of their careers.
bwwExcerpt: I'm confessing nothing, but don't be surprised if you find yourself singing along to "Leaving It All Up to You" and scurrying to YouTube to binge on vintage Donny & Marie clips.
showScoreExcerpt: Angela Lansbury and Marian Seldes bring their formidable combined stage experience to bear on Terrence McNally's slight but affecting two-hander about longtime tennis partners facing the twilight of their careers.
rejectionReasoning: openai: The review mentions Angela Lansbury and Marian Seldes, indicating it is about a previous production, not the current Broadway run.; kimi: This review references Angela Lansbury and Marian Seldes in a Terrence McNally play about tennis partners ('Deuce'), which played Broadway in 2007. Both actresses are deceased (Seldes 2014, Lansbury 2022), so this cannot be a review of a current Broadway production.
